naslov: Villa (apartmanska zgrada) Pag: 600m2 na parceli od 3791m2 (9 apartman (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Izuzetna prilika! Na prodaju je prekrasna apartmanska vila smještena u gradu Pagu, prvi red do mora, s nevjerojatnim panoramskim pogledom. Ova impozantna nekretnina sastoji se od ukupno 9 apartmana, činćii je idealnom investicijom i luksuznim domom uz obalu Jadranskog mora. Kuća se prostire na 600m2 stambene površine, smještena na zemljištu od 1991 m2, pružajući dovoljno prostora za uživanje u privatnosti i prekrasnom okolišu. Ispod kuće nalazi se pripadajuća parcela od 1800m2 turističke namjene na kojoj se nalazi boćalište i zelenilo, a također služi i u svrhu dodatnog parkirališta i mjesto za druženje. Kuća se sastoji od 3 etaže, odnosno 2. kata + potkrovlje i dodatnog stambenog objekta od 36m2. Kuća je 1975. godine, a posljednje obnove i renovacije bile su 2015. godine i to: Instalacije struje i vode keramika i parket inox ograde nove grede novo krovište nova termofasada pvc stolarija nove kupaonice nove kuhinje Kuća se sastoji od 9 apartmana. Svaki od 9 apartmana oduševljava svojim jedinstvenim rasporedom, a ponuda uključuje: 4 apartmana s dvije sobe i dnevnim boravakom. 4 apartmana s jednom sobom i dnevnim boravkom. 1 jednosoban apartman. Svaki apartman opremljen je novom kupaonicom s wc-om, TV-om, internetom, novo uređenom kuhinjom, pvc stolarijom i klima uređajem. Svi apartmani pružaju visokokvalitetnu udobnost i predivan pogled na more. Apartmanska vila nudi također mogučnost parkiranja za sedam vozila. Zgrada je nakon obnove i renovacija certificirana kao energetski razred B. Kuća je trenutno klasificirana kao 3-zvjezdasti objekt s uhodanim poslom turističke namjene, otvarajući priliku za nastavak turističkog najma za budućeg investitiora. Također, s dodavanjem radnih stolova ima uvijete za 4 zvjezdice. Kuću okružuje dvorište i zelenilo, te se u dvorištu nalaze zajednički roštilj, prostor za druženje i prostor za opuštanje. Ova apartmanska vila je prilika koja se ne propušta, pružajući spoj luksuza, pogodnosti i potencijala za profitabilno poslovanje. Zgrada ima uporabnu dozvolu i moguća je kupnja preko kredita banke. Ukoliko se kupuje sama kuća, cijena iznosi 950000e. Ukoliko se kupuje kuća sa parcelom od 1800m2 turističke namjene i zemljišta za parkiralište, cijena iznosi 1350000e. Za dodatne informacije ili razgledavanje, stojimo Vam na raspolaganju. Matej Marković Direktor Kontakt: 0914484702 Mail: matej@zavasnekretnine.hr WEB: https://www.zavasnekretnine.hr/ An exceptional opportunity! For sale is a beautiful apartment villa located in the town of Pag, first row to the sea, with an incredible panoramic view. This imposing property consists of a total of 9 apartments, making it an ideal investment and luxury home by the coast of the Adriatic Sea. The house covers 600 m2 of living space, located on a plot of 1991 m2, providing enough space to enjoy privacy and beautiful surroundings. Below the house there is a plot of 1800 m2 for tourist use, where there is a bocce ball court and greenery, and it also serves as an additional parking lot and a place for socializing. The house consists of 3 floors, i.e. 2nd floor + attic and an additional residential building of 36m2. The house was built in 1975, and the last renovations were in 2015, namely: Electricity and water installations ceramics and parquet stainless steel fences new beams new roof new thermal facade PVC doors and windows new bathrooms new kitchen The house consists of 9 apartments. Each of the 9 apartments delights with its unique layout, and the offer includes: 4 apartments with two rooms and a living room. 4 apartments with one room and living room. 1 one-room apartment. Each apartment is equipped with a new bathroom with a toilet, TV, internet, a newly decorated kitchen, PVC joinery and air conditioning. All apartments offer high-quality comfort and a wonderful view of the sea. The apartment villa also offers the possibility of parking for seven vehicles. After the renovation, the building was certified as energy class B. The house is currently classified as a 3-star property with an established tourist business, opening up the opportunity for continued tourist rental for a future investor. Also, with the addition of work tables, there are conditions for 4 stars. The house is surrounded by a yard and greenery, and in the yard there is a common barbecue, a space for socializing and a place for relaxation. This apartment villa is an opportunity not to be missed, providing a combination of luxury, convenience and potential for profitable business. The building has a use permit and it is possible to purchase it through a bank loan. If the house itself is bought, the price is 950,000e. If you are buying a house with a plot of 1,800 m2 for tourist purposes and land for a parking lot, the price is 1,350,000 e. For additional information or sightseeing, we are at your disposal.
